column4: re ITunes folder on a windows drive. Can I look at it with linux? Can I transfer "all" of it to something playable on my Ubuntu system?  Can I see it and pick and choose what I want to export as something playable on my Ubuntu system?

I want to save some of the music and reformat the drive for Ubuntu. The windows installation has been pretty trashed and I cant get into a user account. On the other hand, thru task manager, I can run winodws programs. Go figure.
you can mount the windows partition from within ubuntu, and once you find the iTunes folder just copy it over to a folder on your ubuntu partition
so mount the windows partition and burn them with brasero in ubuntu
